00025  * @brief  Simple class for reading tsv file of calls generated from Axiom blob - not
00026  *      using TranslationInputTsvTable because of varying number of columns
00027  */

00030 #include "CallsFileReader.h"
00031 #include <stdlib.h>

00033 const std::string CallsFileReader::s_sEmpty = "";

00035 CallsFileReader::CallsFileReader() {
00036   m_iExp = -1;
00037   m_iRow = -1;
00038   m_iNumExp = 0;
00039   m_iNumRows = 0;
00040   m_iMaxAlleles = 2;
00041 }
00042 
00043 CallsFileReader::~CallsFileReader () {
00044   if (m_fstream.is_open()) {
00045     m_fstream.close();
00046   }
00047 }
00048 
00049 // readFile
00050 //   read a Calls file generated from Axiom package using apt-package-to-calls
00051 //
00052 bool CallsFileReader::readFile(const std::string& sFilename) {
00053   m_fstream.open(sFilename.c_str(), std::fstream::in | std::fstream::binary);
00054   if (!m_fstream.is_open() || !m_fstream.good() || m_fstream.eof()) {
00055     // Need some error handling and reporting here
00056     return false;
00057   }
00058   // get first line
00059   std::string line;
00060   getLine(line);
00061   // strip any comment lines
00062   while (!m_fstream.eof() && (line.empty() || line[0] == '#')) {
00063     if (line.find("#%MaxAlleles") != std::string::npos) {
00064       std::string::size_type epos = line.find("=");
00065       std::string sMaxAlleles = line.substr(epos+1);
00066       m_iMaxAlleles = atoi(sMaxAlleles.c_str());
00067     }
00068     getLine(line);
00069   }
00070   if (line.empty() || line[0] == '#') {
00071     // Report error
00072     return false;
00073   }
00074   // parse header line
00075   std::vector<std::string> vFields;
00076   splitLine(line, vFields);
00077   int iNumFields = vFields.size();
00078   if (iNumFields < 1 || vFields[0] != "Probeset") {
00079     // Report error
00080     return false;
00081   }
00082   // set experiment names
00083   for (int i=1; i<vFields.size(); ++i) {
00084     m_vExperiments.push_back(vFields[i]);
00085   }
00086   m_iNumExp = m_vExperiments.size();
00087   m_iNumRows = 0;
00088   //
00089   // read rows
00090   //
00091   getLine(line);
00092   while (!(m_fstream.eof() || m_fstream.bad() || m_fstream.fail())) {
00093     splitLine(line, vFields);
00094     if (vFields.size() != iNumFields) {
00095       // report error
00096       return false;
00097     }
00098     m_vProbesetIds.push_back(vFields[0]);
00099     std::vector<std::string> vCalls (m_iNumExp);
00100     for (int i=1; i<vFields.size(); ++i) {
00101       vCalls.at(i-1) = vFields.at(i);
00102     }
00103     m_vvCalls.push_back(vCalls);
00104     m_iNumRows++;
00105     getLine(line);
00106   }
00107   return true;
00108 };
00109 
00110 bool CallsFileReader::nextRow() {
00111   return (++m_iRow < m_iNumRows);
00112 }
00113   
00114 bool CallsFileReader::nextExperiment() {
00115   m_iRow = -1; // need to call nextRow() to get first row
00116   return (++m_iExp < m_iNumExp);
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 bool CallsFileReader::getLine(std::string& line) {
00121  line.clear();
00122  if (!m_fstream.is_open() || !m_fstream.good() || m_fstream.eof()) {
00123    return false;
00124  }
00125  while (true) {
00126     int c = m_fstream.get();
00127     if (c == -1) { // eof
00128       break;
00129     }
00130     // CR,  LF, CR&LF, LF&CR,
00131     if ((c==0x0a)||(c==0x0d)) {
00132       // check to see if we gobble the next char too.
00133       int c_next=m_fstream.get();
00134       if (! ( ((c==0x0a)&&(c_next==0x0d)) ||
00135       ((c==0x0d)&&(c_next==0x0a)) )) {
00136         m_fstream.unget();
00137       }
00138       break;
00139     }
00140     line.push_back(c);
00141   }
00142   return true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void CallsFileReader::splitLine(const std::string& line, std::vector<std::string>&  vFields) {
00146   vFields.clear();
00147   std::string::size_type pos1=0;
00148   std::string::size_type pos2=0;
00149   pos2 = line.find("\t",pos1);
00150   while (pos2 != std::string::npos) {
00151     vFields.push_back(line.substr(pos1,pos2-pos1));
00152     pos1 = pos2+1;
00153     pos2 = line.find("\t",pos1);
00154   }
00155   if (pos1 < line.size()) {
00156     vFields.push_back(line.substr(pos1, line.size()-pos1));
00157   }
00158 }
